name: Floating Balloon
description:
Floating Baloon is an HTML5 game where you have to reach your balloon to the sky with your mouse.

Controls:-

1. Click on the place you want your balloon to reach to avoid obstacles

2. You can also slide along your mouse with the balloon to move

Floating Baloon is a game developed within 5 hours with Notepad as an IDE. (I love to torture myself (:)
